entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -21.9°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then clear. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
